item.title: David Lynch Dies At 78
item.description: David Lynch – the surrealistic director behind Blue Velvet, Mulholland Drive, the TV show Twin Peaks, and more – has passed away at the age of 78.

item.title: Sonic The Hedgehog 3 Has The Most Epic Ending Of The Entire Franchise
item.description: The fight between Sonic and Shadow and Ivo Robotnik's emotional sacrifice ensure that Sonic the Hedgehog 3 easily has the best ending of the series.

item.title: Rotten Tomatoes' Biggest Award Goes To $714M Movie With 92% That Just Lost Big At The Golden Globes
item.description: Rotten Tomatoes offers its biggest award to a movie that just lost at the Golden Globes in spite of its 92% score and $714 million box office haul.
